OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Right before Karlach's recruitment Wyl recognizes her as the target Mizora gave to him. It will be up to the player to avoid the confrontation with her. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Xh6W54Z2kT7NfVgxgmED_3BD2sbbs62vjFxXMYfMGgc/edit?pli=1#bookmark=id.y05ljfyxmujl
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: With Wyll as an avatar or as a companion but alone and far from the party speak with Karlach during her recruimtent.

OM_Wyll_VB.synopsis: Wyll wasn't present at Karlach recruitment, reacts to her in the party with a follow up in the camp.

OM_Wyll_COM.synopsis: Right before Karlach's recruitment Wyl recognizes her as the target Mizora gave to him. It will be up to the player to avoid the confrontation with her. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Xh6W54Z2kT7NfVgxgmED_3BD2sbbs62vjFxXMYfMGgc/edit?pli=1#bookmark=id.y05ljfyxmujl
OM_Wyll_COM.how_to_trigger: Have Wyll in your party and speak with Karlach during her recruimtent.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_49.context:
CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Karlach is crouched, head in hands, breathing heavily, surrounded by flames, burning.
NodeContext: A sound that could be mistaken for a fire building within her, or consuming her from within

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_143.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_143.text: One horn. The stink of Avernus. Advocatus diaboli.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_1.text: Well I'll be godsdamned - the Blade of Frontiers. Thought I'd shaken you for good. That'll teach me to underestimate you.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_1.context:
CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Karlach looks to Wyll, smiles, and stands, shaking the flames off herself.
"Well I'll be..."

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_308.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_308.text: I know who you are and I know who you serve. Zariel's lickspittle, gladiator in the archdevil's army.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_223.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_223.text: You've got to be half-troll for your head to be that hard. I'm not working for Zariel. I'm running from her.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_292.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_292.text: We've both got a brain-worm. I know you can see into my mind, see the truth. I'm home now - out of the Hells. I just want to live.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_169.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_169.text: I won't fall for this devilish trickery.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_169.context: NodeContext: Fighting with himself. He doesn't want to believe it.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_115.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_115.text: Please. It's Wyll, right? We don't have to do this.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_115.context: NodeContext: Trying one last effort to calm him.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_73.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_73.text: You don't know what this means. You don't know what you're asking me to do.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_73.context: NodeContext: Fighting with himself. He doesn't want to believe it. Not killing Karlach means punishment from Mizora

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_2.text: I'm asking you to live, Wyll. I don't want to hurt you. And, to be frank, I'd rather not find out how the Blade got his name.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_11.text: *If you take her at her word, you can't possibly fulfil your mission in good conscience. But break the terms of your pact, and the consequences will be unfathomable.*

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_91.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_91.text: If I believe you, Karlach, it'll be me who pays the price.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_222.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_222.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) There's a pause, and then Wyll swears. He realises he has resigned himself to becoming a devil himself. He's upset - but he knows he did the right thing.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_122.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_122.text: You really are no devil, are you? I've... I've been deceived.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_71.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_71.text: Thank the gods. Thought I was going to have to take your head.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_71.context: NodeContext: Relieved Wyll is seeing sense. Calming down from her anger.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_68.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_68.text: You would've died in the attempt. But - there have been enough threats today.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_248.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_248.context: NodeContext: A little bit of uncertainty, hoping Wyll is calming down

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_217.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_217.context: NodeContext: Resigned to his fate but knows he's making the right decision in not attacking Karlach.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_293.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_293.text: Look - you don't have to trust me blindly. I'll prove to you I'm as clean as they come. In fact, we're in the same line of work, in a way.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_305.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_305.text: I'd like to team up. Send your leader my way so we can work out the particulars.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_63.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_63.text: I think I told you to get the fuck out of my face, for your own good.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_137.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_137.text: I think I told you to get the fuck out of my face, for your own good.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_266.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_266.context:
CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Karlach is crouched, head in hands, breathing heavily, surrounded by flames, burning.
NodeContext: A sound that could be mistaken for a fire building within her, or consuming her from within

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_55.text: Well I'll be godsdamned - the Blade of Frontiers. Thought I'd shaken you for good. That'll teach me to underestimate you.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_55.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Karlach looks up to player (Wyll) standing there, and stands up, body still aflame.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_99.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_99.text: Chk. This is Zariel's servant wreaking havoc on the Coast?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_267.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_267.text: Look - it's an honour to be chased by a famed hero. I'm no devil, though. Not by a long shot.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_179.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_179.text: You were engulfed in flames but a moment ago. Only a devil could have survived it.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_273.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_273.text: I can explain. But it's a whole situation.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_72.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_72.text: My sources say otherwise. Not a devil? Prove it.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_44.text: How should I do that exactly? Carve out my soul to serve with a nice side of turnips?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_171.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_171.text: If you'd just hear me out -

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_211.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_211.text: *The parasites connect you, a vision unfolds. Karlach's blade raised, slicing through devils - Zariel's servants - as her eyes dart around, seeking escape.*
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_211.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_60.text: *Her rage and desperation seep into you. She is a victim of the Blood War, not an agent of it.*
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_245.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_245.context: CinematicNodeContext: Overcome by the mind meld. It's the first time it's happened. She shakes off her shock and looks at Wyll.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_14.text: I'll give you one chance to explain what I just saw.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_13.text: I never wanted to serve Zariel. I was enlisted in her army against my will. Forced to fight, and fight I did.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_297.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_297.text: When I saw an opportunity to get away, I took it. I'm finally home - or near it, anyway.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_254.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_254.text: You almost seem to mean it.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_198.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_198.text: And you almost seem sensible. On my heart, I'm telling you the truth.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_198.context: NodeContext: Her version of 'on my honour.' Sincerely, trying to convince Wyll she's not a devil

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_277.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_277.text: How do I know this isn't another devil's trick?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_84.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_84.text: You know monsters, right? Better than anyone. Look into my eyes. Can't you see I'm not what you think?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_208.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_208.text: *If you believe her, killing her would be a crime. But break your pact, and the consequences will be unfathomable.*

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_186.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_186.text: You don't understand what you're asking me to do.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_30.text: I want us both to live. That's all.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_131.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_131.text: Whatever the consequences may be, we'll face them together. If you'll have me.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_120.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_120.text: Save your breath. Let's see if this devil bleeds.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_309.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_309.text: Please. It's Wyll, right? We don't have to do this.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_309.context: NodeContext: Trying one last effort to calm him.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_161.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_161.text: Control yourself, Wyll. I understand bloodthirst. But this is no time to quench it.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_173.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_173.text: Stand down, Wyll. She's fiery, but no devil.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_53.text: Now, now, children - let's not lose our heads. Figuratively or literally.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_53.context: NodeContext: Wyll and Karlach are ready to fight and kill each other. Astarion speaks up to try and stop them

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_138.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_138.text: *If you believe her, killing her would be a crime. But break your pact, and the consequences will be unfathomable.*

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_158.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_158.text: If I believe you, Karlach, it'll be me who pays the price.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_59.text: Whatever that price may be, I'll help you pay it. We'll be in this together.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_233.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_233.text: How can I make peace with the monster I was sent to kill?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_241.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_241.text: You don't know what this means. You don't know what you're asking me to do.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_129.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_129.text: I'm asking you to live, Wyll. I don't want to hurt you. And, to be frank, I'd rather not find out how the Blade got his name.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_315.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_315.text: Dammit. This is an unwelcome complication.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_19.text: Thank the gods, he sees sense! Look, Blade - Wyll - I know you love bashing evil - we have that in common.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_202.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_202.text: What say we take our mind off things with a little fun?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_57.text: I may not be a devil, but I can put that reputation of yours to work.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_296.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_296.text: How would you feel about helping me kill some evil bastards?
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_296.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll stands down and Karlach douses her flames.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_65.text: That sounds like exactly what I need.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_50.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_50.text: A little background, if your moral compass needs something to point at...
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_50.context: NodeContext: About to tell a story

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_312.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_312.text: You already know I fought in the Blood War. I was good. Really good.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_312.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vision that shows Karlach in action. Karlach speaks over the shots. (We’ll reuse this for her origin intro then)

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_100.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_100.text: Turns out I've got a knack for killing demons. That made me a valuable asset. Zariel - the archdevil herself - made me as her personal attack dog.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_175.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_175.text: I played along until I could get the fuck out of there, but devils don't like to lose their assets.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_87.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_87.text: Zariel liked it so little, she sent a bunch of goons, so-called 'Paladins of Tyr' after me. Until a minute ago, I thought you were working with them. They want to take me back to the Hells.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_247.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_247.text: But believe me when I say I'd rather die.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_250.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_250.text: Let's send them back where they came from.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_102.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_102.text: Fuck yes. They cornered me outside the tollhouse, just up the hill. Doubt they've gone far after the scorching I gave 'em.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_257.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_257.text: Then we can work on evicting this parasite and take Faerûn by the short hairs. Sound good?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_199.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_199.text: A warrior who winks at her foes while she slays them. You'd be a fool to refuse her.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_184.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_184.text: I like her. She looks like she could throw me over her shoulder and carry me to safety, should the need arise.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_85.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_85.text: I'd hug you if it wouldn't scorch your skin off.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_318.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_318.text: Hang on - I said I'd help you, not team up with you long-term.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_90.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_90.text: Trust me - when you see what I'm capable of, you won't regret it.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_192.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_192.text: She's almost as scary as you, Lae'zel. So naturally she gets my vote.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_192.context: NodeContext: "You want to just..." has a "wtf are you thinking?" tone. Then "Because I'm fine with that." is very calm and matter-of-fact

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_225.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_225.text: She's, erm, perhaps a little rough around the edges... but I suppose I can be smooth enough for two...
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_225.context: NodeContext: A little skeptical (taking on a new, larger than life companion)

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_178.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_178.text: So you want me to kill the people hunting you?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_98.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_98.text: Don't worry, I'll lead the charge. But I could use your help. There's a lot of them and only one of me. After that, we can team up. Take Faerûn by the short hairs. Sound good?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_272.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_272.text: A warrior who winks at her foes while she slays them. You'd be a fool to refuse her.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_219.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_219.text: I like her. She looks like she could throw me over her shoulder and carry me to safety, should the need arise.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_168.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_168.text: She's almost as scary as you, Lae'zel. So naturally she gets my vote.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_168.context: NodeContext: "You want to just..." has a "wtf are you thinking?" tone. Then "Because I'm fine with that." is very calm and matter-of-fact

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_196.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_196.text: Why should I do your dirty work?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_200.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_200.text: Dirty work's the only kind I like. Gets even messier the more bodies you throw at it. Think of the potential.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_200.context: NodeContext: Some light flirtation in her voice.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_213.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_213.text: She's, erm, perhaps a little rough around the edges... but I suppose I can be smooth enough for two...
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_213.context: NodeContext: A little skeptical (taking on a new, larger than life companion)

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_155.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_155.text: Why should I do your dirty work?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_121.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_121.text: Dirty work's the only kind I like. But there are a lot of them and just the one of me. I'll take point, and you flank 'em.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_263.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_263.text: After that, we can team up. Take Faerûn by the short hairs. Sound good?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_86.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_86.text: A warrior who winks at her foes while she slays them. You'd be a fool to refuse her.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_269.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_269.text: I like her. She looks like she could throw me over her shoulder and carry me to safety, should the need arise.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_224.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_224.text: She's almost as scary as you, Lae'zel. So naturally she gets my vote.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_224.context: NodeContext: "You want to just..." has a "wtf are you thinking?" tone. Then "Because I'm fine with that." is very calm and matter-of-fact

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_58.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_58.text: She's, erm, perhaps a little rough around the edges... but I suppose I can be smooth enough for two...
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_58.context: NodeContext: A little skeptical (taking on a new, larger than life companion)

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_15.text: Fuck yes. They cornered me outside the tollhouse, just up the hill. Doubt they've gone far after the scorching I gave 'em.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_187.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_187.text: I have good news for you. I already killed the paladins you say were hunting you.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_164.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_164.text: I have good news for you. I already took care of the paladins you say were hunting you.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_109.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_109.text: That's incredible! In that case, you ought to let me return the favour. My muscle for your aid in my battle against the powers of the arch-bitch.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_286.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_286.context: NodeContext: with hand to side of mouth like a battle/ sports shout.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_110.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_110.text: Why don't you clear things with your leader before we team up. Send 'em my way so we can work out the particulars.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_207.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_207.text: If there's one thing Zariel taught me, it's not to fuck with the top dog until it's absolutely necessary.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_264.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_264.text: No room in your party. What should I do?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_47.text: All right - I'll catch up with you later. But don't get to any of the fun stuff without me - got it?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_51.text: I'll catch up with you when it's time to camp, for now. But don't get to any of the fun stuff without me - got it?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_135.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_135.text: Take Astarion's place - he can head back to camp.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_183.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_183.text: *Your companion is otherwise engaged. You'll need to dismiss them at a more convenient moment.*

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_150.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_150.text: I would object, but sitting by the fire while you do all the hard work sounds marvellous, actually.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_150.context: NodeContext: Astarion speaking to the companion origin character that's replacing him in the party. "Them" refers to the player's avatar characer.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_180.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_180.text: Gale could do with a rest.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_288.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_288.text: Keeping your greatest weapon in reserve, eh? An excellent strategy.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_227.speaker: Jaheira
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_227.text: Well. I know when I'm not wanted.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_227.context: NodeContext: Well. I know when I'm not wanted. - not shitty, just gentle faux haughtiness

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_300.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_300.text: If you insist. Don't have all the fun without me.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Halsin
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_18.text: I shall be waiting. Come find me when you need me.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_231.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_231.text: I will wait in camp. Patiently, even.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_325.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_325.text: Hang on, though - looks like you've got enough backup at your side. Not sure there's room for me.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_5.text: Phew, I'm getting all het up. Let's make tracks!

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_97.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_97.text: I don't think so - you'll have to go it alone.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_56.text: Damn. After a decade in hell, I was hoping for a little company. Even a big hero once out for my head.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_80.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_80.text: But I can take a hint. Good luck out there. You're gonna need it.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_326.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_326.text: I have good news for you, then. I already killed the paladins you say were hunting you.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_320.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_320.text: You did?! That's incredible! You ought to let me return the favour. We can team up - evict this parasite, then take Faerûn by the short hairs. Sound good?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_203.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_203.text: A warrior who winks at her foes while she slays them. You'd be a fool to refuse her.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_281.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_281.text: I like her. She looks like she could throw me over her shoulder and carry me to safety, should the need arise.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_78.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_78.text: She's almost as scary as you, Lae'zel. So naturally she gets my vote.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_78.context: NodeContext: "You want to just..." has a "wtf are you thinking?" tone. Then "Because I'm fine with that." is very calm and matter-of-fact

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_255.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_255.text: All right - welcome to the team.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_301.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_301.text: She's, erm, perhaps a little rough around the edges... but I suppose I can be smooth enough for two...
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_301.context: NodeContext: A little skeptical (taking on a new, larger than life companion)

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_116.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_116.text: I have my own problems. I don't need yours.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_279.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_279.text: I can see that. But look, if we take care of my little problem, we can move on to yours next. and the tadpole after that.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_67.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_67.text: Kill some fiends, evict a parasite, then take Faerûn by the short hairs. Sound good?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_54.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_54.text: I've got more important things on my mind than monster-hunting at the moment.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_276.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_276.text: I understand, but hear me out. These fucks will be especially fun to hunt.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_31.text: That remains to be seen. I'm sure I'll find out by nightfall.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_283.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_283.text: I won't pester you for details now, but believe me Wyll, I'll be there by your side, whatever comes.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_212.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_212.text: I've broken a vow I swore never to break. My punishment will be severe.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_42.text: That sounds serious. But look, Wyll, you won't face it alone. Whatever it is. I owe you that much.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_149.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_149.text: Maybe I could even show you a little fun before the hammer falls.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_240.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_240.text: It will mean my undoing, but... I believe you.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_304.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_304.text: Thank the gods. I would've taken no pleasure in burning you to a crisp. Well, not much anyway.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_136.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_136.text: And look - you don't have to trust me blindly. I'll prove to you I'm as clean as they come. In fact, we're in the same line of work, in a way.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_170.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_170.text: No. No second-guessing. The devil dies - now.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_79.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_79.text: Too bad. I thought maybe you could be a friend. I could've done with one of those.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_190.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_190.text: Stand down, Wyll. She may add a little extra spice to her language, but she's no devil.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_274.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_274.text: I'm sorry, Karlach. There's too much at stake.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_74.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_74.text: No - I can't believe it. I've been sent to kill you. I can't let you go.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_154.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_154.text: The tadpole that links us suggests you're no willing servant of Zariel.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_142.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_142.text: The tadpole. Gods, there's more to this thing than I realised.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_64.text: Well, whatever else it may be, the tadpole isn't a liar. I never wanted to serve Zariel, and I escaped the first chance I could.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_278.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_278.text: No... I won't fall for this devilish trickery...

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_311.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_311.text: You fight in the Blood War for Zariel. You'll bring violence to the Coast.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_191.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_191.text: Yeah, I stowed away on a mind flayer ship so I could bring the war home. Makes perfect sense.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_188.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_188.text: I've hunted you to the Hells and beyond. It ends here, Karlach.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_226.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_226.text: For shit's sake, you must be half troll to possess a skull that thick.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_209.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_209.text: This is your target, Wyll? I think you may have been misinformed...

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_232.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_232.text: This is your target? I was expecting a little more from a devil.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_232.context: NodeContext: Astarion was expecting the target to be a flaming infernal devil, but is actually just a wounded tiefling. He's a little underwhelmed.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_228.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_228.text: This is your quarry, Wyll? Less devilish than I had anticipated.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_234.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_234.text: Karlach. Advocatus diaboli. I won't be lectured on monsters by Zariel's servant.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_25.text: If I'm wrong about you, prove it. Lay down your weapon, and I will too.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_324.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_324.text: Well, well, well. How the Blade of Frontiers has changed.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_37.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_37.text: I thought you hunted devils, Wyll. Not innocents. Were all those people in the druid's grove monsters? Or is the only monster you?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_172.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_172.text: Karlach. Advocatus diaboli. I won't be lectured on monsters by Zariel's servant.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_282.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_282.text: Were all those people Zariel's servants too? Or is it possible you're going after the wrong people.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_39.text: I guess it doesn't matter now. Your trail of blood ends here and now.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_284.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_284.text: I don't know who told you I was involved in the grove, but it wasn't me.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_45.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_45.text: That's a load of shit. But you know what? Vengeance can wait. And I have other priorities today.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_43.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_43.text: Tsk. That was pathetic - it really was. How said that shitty lie will be the last thing you say. Bye, Blade.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_22.text: If I'm wrong about you, prove it. Lay down your weapon, and I will too.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_4.text: You'd like that, wouldn't you? Set down my blade and watch as you plunge yours in my heart. Not a chance. I intend to live - over your dead body.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_147.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_147.text: If you value your life, you'll stand down.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_159.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_159.text: Argh! You back away first, all right? One false move, and you're dead. I've more important things to do today than kill a rat.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_41.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_41.text: Get the fuck out of here. Now. Before I change my mind.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_258.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_258.text: Oh, I want to live. Just not in a world with you in it.
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_258.context: NodeContext: This precedes combat so heightened.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_34.text: You've got it all wrong. I've got a contract for your head, and I'm going to take it.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_112.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_112.context: NodeContext: Player just said they're here for her head. She's going to fight them after this.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_103.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_103.text: I don't need to explain myself to Zariel's lickspittle. Your head is mine.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_133.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_133.text: I didn't want those people to die. It was all a big mistake.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_111.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_111.text: Tell it to their corpses. Murderer.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_166.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_166.text: I'm not the only one after you, Karlach. Some paladins of Tyr want you dead, too. I suppose we're all wrong about you?

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_261.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_261.text: You suppose right. Not that it matters anymore. You're too dangerous - I've got to put a stop to you.

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_130.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_130.text: I won't explain myself to a devil. Face me!

OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_153.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_153.context: NodeContext: Burning hot, right before a fight.

OM_Wyll_VB_1.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_VB_1.text: Hells. It's her - Karlach, the archdevil's servant. We must rest in camp. It's time she had her due.

OM_Wyll_VB_0.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_VB_0.text: Shit. I just can't shake you, can I?

OM_Wyll_COM_25.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_25.text: Well, well, well. How the Blade of Frontiers has changed.

OM_Wyll_COM_263.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_263.text: I thought you hunted devils, Wyll. Not innocents. Were all those people in the druid's grove monsters? Or is the only monster you?

OM_Wyll_COM_227.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_227.text: Karlach. Advocatus diaboli. I won't be lectured on monsters by Zariel's servant.

OM_Wyll_COM_178.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_178.text: What happened in the grove was a horror - one I won't ignore. But nor will I let a devil roam the Coast unchallenged.

OM_Wyll_COM_78.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_78.text: Please. The only devils here are you lot.

OM_Wyll_COM_194.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_194.text: Wyll, do what you came here to do. End this devil.

OM_Wyll_COM_73.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_73.text: Aye. Your reign of horror is over, Karlach.

OM_Wyll_COM_10.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_10.text: It's an honour to end the fucker who killed all those people - all those innocent people. You monster.
OM_Wyll_COM_10.context: NodeContext: Player just said they're here for her head. She's going to fight them after this.

OM_Wyll_COM_150.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_150.text: Listen, it was all a misunderstanding. We didn't mean for them to die.

OM_Wyll_COM_80.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_80.text: You're not the worst liar I've ever met. But you're daft as a brick if you think I'm going to believe that.

OM_Wyll_COM_216.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_216.text: Those people in the grove weren't what they seemed. They were agents of evil.

OM_Wyll_COM_181.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_181.text: That's a load of shit. But you know what? Vengeance can wait. And I have other priorities today.

OM_Wyll_COM_72.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_72.text: Tsk. That was pathetic - it really was. How said that shitty lie will be the last thing you say. Bye, fucker. You too, Blade.

OM_Wyll_COM_160.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_160.text: If Wyll is wrong about you, prove it. Lay down your weapon, and we will too.

OM_Wyll_COM_116.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_116.text: You'd like that, wouldn't you? Set down my blade and watch as you plunge yours in my heart. Not a chance. I intend to live - over your dead body.

OM_Wyll_COM_169.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_169.text: If you value your life, you'll stand down.

OM_Wyll_COM_81.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_81.text: Argh! You back away first, all right? One false move, and you're dead. I've more important things to do today than kill a rat.

OM_Wyll_COM_261.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_261.text: Get the fuck out of here. Now. Before I change my mind.

OM_Wyll_COM_129.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_129.text: As for the Blade of Frontiers - you fashion yourself a hero, but you lie down with dogs like this. That's just pathetic.

OM_Wyll_COM_154.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_154.text: Oh, I want to live. Just not in a world with you in it.
OM_Wyll_COM_154.context: NodeContext: This precedes combat so heightened.

OM_Wyll_COM_195.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_195.text: We don't have to explain ourselves to you.

OM_Wyll_COM_55.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_55.text: Your actions in the grove were indefensible. But Karlach seeks only to drive a deeper wedge between us than already exists.

OM_Wyll_COM_156.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_156.text: This is cute. I'm still going to cave your murderous heads in, but it's nice to get a peek at the inside drama first.

OM_Wyll_COM_234.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_234.text: Some paladins of Tyr want you dead. We were thinking we'd oblige them.

OM_Wyll_COM_212.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_212.context: NodeContext: Player just said they're here for her head. She's going to fight them after this.

OM_Wyll_COM_145.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_145.text: I think I told you to get the fuck out of my face, for your own good.

OM_Wyll_COM_214.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_214.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Karlach is crouched, head in hands, breathing heavily, surrounded by flames, burning.NodeContext: A sound that could be mistaken for a fire building within her, or consuming her from within

OM_Wyll_COM_113.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_113.text: One horn. The stink of Avernus. Advocatus diaboli.

OM_Wyll_COM_269.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_269.text: Well I'll be godsdamned - the Blade of Frontiers. Thought I'd shaken you for good. That'll teach me to underestimate you.
OM_Wyll_COM_269.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Karlach looks to Wyll, smiles, and stands, but she is still aflame

OM_Wyll_COM_53.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_53.text: You're the devil we've been hunting. Karlach, right?

OM_Wyll_COM_255.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_255.text: Bloody right. An honour to be chased by the Blade of Frontiers. But - agh!
OM_Wyll_COM_255.context: NodeContext: A bit of sarcasm. It's not an honour. Not too malicious though. She doesn't hate Wyll, just isn't impressed by him.

OM_Wyll_COM_242.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_242.text: Tell me, monster - what's it like to know you're about to die?

OM_Wyll_COM_200.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_200.text: Touch me and you'll regret it.
OM_Wyll_COM_200.context: NodeContext: Jocular in tone. It's a threat, but she's not mean-mugging. She wants a chance to explain herself before the player starts attacking.

OM_Wyll_COM_4.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_4.text: *A great heat roars through you; her heat, fiery as the Hells.*
OM_Wyll_COM_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

OM_Wyll_COM_162.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_162.text: *Then you're lost in visions of demonic armies as you tear through a landscape of fire and blood.*
OM_Wyll_COM_162.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

OM_Wyll_COM_193.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_193.text: *The Blood War. You saw it from above as the nautiloid passed through Avernus - this woman was on the frontline.*
OM_Wyll_COM_193.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

OM_Wyll_COM_136.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_136.text: Evidence. Proof that you're a devil, a gladiator in the archdevil Zariel's army.

OM_Wyll_COM_218.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_218.text: I can explain. But it's a whole situation. If you'd just hear me out -

OM_Wyll_COM_197.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_197.text: *Another vision. Karlach's blade raised, slicing through devils - Zariel's servants - as her eyes dart around, seeking escape.*
OM_Wyll_COM_197.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

OM_Wyll_COM_76.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_76.text: *Her rage and desperation seep into you. She is a victim of the Blood War, not an agent of it.*
OM_Wyll_COM_76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands to temples, mindmeld is happening

OM_Wyll_COM_183.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_183.text: She's trying to trick us. Don't believe her lies.
OM_Wyll_COM_183.context: NodeContext: Questioning himself. He has learned the 'monster' he hunts is a victim, but he still ready to attack

OM_Wyll_COM_211.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_211.text: You saw the truth. I never wanted to serve Zariel. I was enlisted in her army against my will. Forced to fight, and fight I did.

OM_Wyll_COM_203.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_203.text: When I saw an opportunity to get away, I took it. I'm finally home - or near it, anyway.

OM_Wyll_COM_96.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_96.text: You served her. That's enough to damn you.

OM_Wyll_COM_111.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_111.text: Stand down, Wyll. You saw what I saw.

OM_Wyll_COM_14.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_14.text: Be practical. She's infected, same as us - and powerful, too. We can use her as an ally.

OM_Wyll_COM_114.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_114.text: *Wyll catches his breath, and his lips straighten. Sheer dread twists his face.*
OM_Wyll_COM_114.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll catches his breath, and his face hardens. Signs of worry, fear - even sheer dread.

OM_Wyll_COM_228.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_228.text: You don't know what you're saying. You're asking me to trust a devil.

OM_Wyll_COM_254.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_254.text: Gods, you're stubborn. Karlach's not a devil, and you know it.

OM_Wyll_COM_90.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_90.text: Listen to sense, now. I don't want this to end badly for either of us.

OM_Wyll_COM_232.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_232.text: You know monsters, right? Better than anyone. Look into my eyes. Can't you see I'm not what you think?

OM_Wyll_COM_64.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_64.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) There's a pause, and then Wyll swears. He realises he has resigned himself to becoming a devil himself. He's upset - but he knows he did the right thing.

OM_Wyll_COM_165.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_165.text: You really are no devil, are you? I've... I've been deceived.

OM_Wyll_COM_182.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_182.text: Thank the gods. Thought I was going to have to take your head.
OM_Wyll_COM_182.context: NodeContext: Relieved Wyll is seeing sense. Calming down from her anger.

OM_Wyll_COM_65.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_65.text: You would've died in the attempt. But - there have been enough threats today.

OM_Wyll_COM_238.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_238.context: NodeContext: A little bit of uncertainty, hoping Wyll is calming down

OM_Wyll_COM_17.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_17.context: NodeContext: Resigned to his fate but knows he's making the right decision in not attacking Karlach.

OM_Wyll_COM_112.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_112.text: I'm Karlach - but you already knew that. And you are...?

OM_Wyll_COM_141.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_141.text: Well met, soldier. Nice to meet a friendly around here - it's been tough going so far.

OM_Wyll_COM_74.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_74.text: I may not be a devil, but I can put the Blade's reputation to work.

OM_Wyll_COM_124.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_124.text: How would you feel about helping me kill some evil bastards?

OM_Wyll_COM_87.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_87.text: I'm your ticket to curing that tadpole - eventually.

OM_Wyll_COM_30.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_30.text: Really now? First I catch a ride out of Avernus, then I stumble into a friend. Who's the goddess of luck again? I owe her a flower.

OM_Wyll_COM_168.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_168.text: Now that we're old pals, how would you feel about helping me kill some evil bastards?

OM_Wyll_COM_230.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_230.text: I'm not interested in making friends.

OM_Wyll_COM_7.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_7.text: Oh boy, an arsehole! I've already won the Blade of Frontiers over; hope you'll prove more of a challenge.

OM_Wyll_COM_98.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_98.text: You've stayed my blade. Friendship? Don't push it.
OM_Wyll_COM_98.context: NodeContext: Grim; he's going to pay a huge price for this.

OM_Wyll_COM_107.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_107.text: Fair enough. Let me try again, with a little fun thrown in. How'd you like to help me kill some evil bastards?

OM_Wyll_COM_260.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_260.text: A little background, if your moral compass needs something to point at...
OM_Wyll_COM_260.context: NodeContext: About to tell a story

OM_Wyll_COM_161.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_161.text: You already know I fought in the Blood War. I was good. Really good.
OM_Wyll_COM_161.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vision that shows Karlach in action. Karlach speaks over the shots. (We’ll reuse this for her origin intro then)

OM_Wyll_COM_187.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_187.text: Turns out I've got a knack for killing demons. That made me a valuable asset. Zariel - the archdevil herself - made me as her personal attack dog.

OM_Wyll_COM_144.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_144.text: I played along until I could get the fuck out of there, but devils don't like to lose their assets.

OM_Wyll_COM_46.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_46.text: Zariel liked it so little, she sent a bunch of goons, so-called 'Paladins of Tyr', to take me back. Problem is, I'm not going.

OM_Wyll_COM_268.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_268.text: Let's send them back where they came from.

OM_Wyll_COM_58.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_58.text: Fuck yes. They cornered me outside the tollhouse, just up the hill. Doubt they've gone far after the scorching I gave 'em.

OM_Wyll_COM_137.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_137.text: Then we can work on evicting this parasite and take Faerûn by the short hairs. Sound good?

OM_Wyll_COM_159.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_COM_159.text: I like her. She looks like she could throw me over her shoulder and carry me to safety, should the need arise.

OM_Wyll_COM_13.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_COM_13.text: She's almost as scary as you, Lae'zel. So naturally she gets my vote.
OM_Wyll_COM_13.context: NodeContext: "You want to just..." has a "wtf are you thinking?" tone. Then "Because I'm fine with that." is very calm and matter-of-fact

OM_Wyll_COM_8.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_COM_8.text: She's, erm, perhaps a little rough around the edges... but I suppose I can be smooth enough for two...
OM_Wyll_COM_8.context: NodeContext: A little skeptical (taking on a new, larger than life companion)

OM_Wyll_COM_125.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_125.text: I'd hug you if it wouldn't scorch your skin off.

OM_Wyll_COM_151.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_151.text: Hang on - I said I'd help you, not team up with you long-term.

OM_Wyll_COM_83.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_83.text: Trust me - when you see what I'm capable of, you won't regret it.

OM_Wyll_COM_191.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Wyll_COM_191.text: A warrior who winks at her foes while she slays them. You'd be a fool to refuse her.

OM_Wyll_COM_106.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_106.text: So you want me to kill the people hunting you?

OM_Wyll_COM_12.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_12.text: Don't worry, I'll lead the charge. But I could use your help. There's a lot of them and only one of me. After that, we can team up. Take Faerûn by the short hairs. Sound good?

OM_Wyll_COM_103.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_COM_103.text: I like her. She looks like she could throw me over her shoulder and carry me to safety, should the need arise.

OM_Wyll_COM_108.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_COM_108.text: She's almost as scary as you, Lae'zel. So naturally she gets my vote.
OM_Wyll_COM_108.context: NodeContext: "You want to just..." has a "wtf are you thinking?" tone. Then "Because I'm fine with that." is very calm and matter-of-fact

OM_Wyll_COM_15.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Wyll_COM_15.text: A warrior who winks at her foes while she slays them. You'd be a fool to refuse her.

OM_Wyll_COM_50.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_50.text: I have good news for you. I already killed the paladins you say were hunting you.

OM_Wyll_COM_102.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_102.text: That's incredible! In that case, you ought to let me return the favour. My muscle for your aid in my battle against the powers of the arch-bitch.

OM_Wyll_COM_189.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_189.context: NodeContext: with hand to side of mouth like a battle/ sports shout.

OM_Wyll_COM_140.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_140.text: Why don't you clear things with your leader before we team up. Send 'em my way so we can work out the particulars.

OM_Wyll_COM_192.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_192.text: If there's one thing Zariel taught me, it's not to fuck with the top dog until it's absolutely necessary.

OM_Wyll_COM_264.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_264.text: No room in your party. What should I do?

OM_Wyll_COM_248.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_248.text: All right - I'll catch up with you later. But don't get to any of the fun stuff without me - got it?

OM_Wyll_COM_196.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_196.text: I'll catch up with you when it's time to camp, for now. But don't get to any of the fun stuff without me - got it?

OM_Wyll_COM_123.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_123.text: Take Astarion's place - he can head back to camp.

OM_Wyll_COM_258.speaker: Narrator
OM_Wyll_COM_258.text: *Your companion is otherwise engaged. You'll need to dismiss them at a more convenient moment.*

OM_Wyll_COM_171.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_COM_171.text: I would object, but sitting by the fire while you do all the hard work sounds marvellous, actually.
OM_Wyll_COM_171.context: NodeContext: Astarion speaking to the companion origin character that's replacing him in the party. "Them" refers to the player's avatar characer.

OM_Wyll_COM_148.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_148.text: Gale could do with a rest.

OM_Wyll_COM_132.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_COM_132.text: Keeping your greatest weapon in reserve, eh? An excellent strategy.

OM_Wyll_COM_135.speaker: Jaheira
OM_Wyll_COM_135.text: Well. I know when I'm not wanted.
OM_Wyll_COM_135.context: NodeContext: Well. I know when I'm not wanted. - not shitty, just gentle faux haughtiness

OM_Wyll_COM_204.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_COM_204.text: If you insist. Don't have all the fun without me.

OM_Wyll_COM_48.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_48.text: You can trade places with Wyll.

OM_Wyll_COM_172.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_172.text: All right. I know a shortcut.

OM_Wyll_COM_163.speaker: Halsin
OM_Wyll_COM_163.text: I shall be waiting. Come find me when you need me.

OM_Wyll_COM_95.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
OM_Wyll_COM_95.text: I will wait in camp. Patiently, even.

OM_Wyll_COM_31.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_31.text: Hang on, though - looks like you've got enough backup at your side. Not sure there's room for me.

OM_Wyll_COM_97.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_97.text: Phew, I'm getting all het up. Let's make tracks!

OM_Wyll_COM_149.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_149.text: I have good news for you. I already took care of the paladins you say were hunting you.

OM_Wyll_COM_121.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_121.text: Fuck yes. They cornered me outside the tollhouse, just up the hill. Doubt they've gone far after the scorching I gave 'em.

OM_Wyll_COM_33.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_33.text: Why should I do your dirty work?

OM_Wyll_COM_101.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_101.text: Dirty work's the only kind I like. Gets even messier the more bodies you throw at it. Think of the potential.
OM_Wyll_COM_101.context: NodeContext: Some light flirtation in her voice.

OM_Wyll_COM_37.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_37.text: I don't think so - you'll have to go it alone.

OM_Wyll_COM_240.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_240.text: Damn. After a decade in hell, I was hoping for a little company. Especially some who looked like you.

OM_Wyll_COM_225.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_225.text: But I can take a hint. Good luck out there. You're gonna need it.

OM_Wyll_COM_188.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_COM_188.text: She's, erm, perhaps a little rough around the edges... but I suppose I can be smooth enough for two...
OM_Wyll_COM_188.context: NodeContext: A little skeptical (taking on a new, larger than life companion)

OM_Wyll_COM_247.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_247.text: Why should I do your dirty work?

OM_Wyll_COM_99.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_99.text: Dirty work's the only kind I like. But there are a lot of them and just the one of me. I'll take point, and you flank 'em.

OM_Wyll_COM_100.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_COM_100.text: I like her. She looks like she could throw me over her shoulder and carry me to safety, should the need arise.

OM_Wyll_COM_127.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_COM_127.text: She's almost as scary as you, Lae'zel. So naturally she gets my vote.
OM_Wyll_COM_127.context: NodeContext: "You want to just..." has a "wtf are you thinking?" tone. Then "Because I'm fine with that." is very calm and matter-of-fact

OM_Wyll_COM_224.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_COM_224.text: She's, erm, perhaps a little rough around the edges... but I suppose I can be smooth enough for two...
OM_Wyll_COM_224.context: NodeContext: A little skeptical (taking on a new, larger than life companion)

OM_Wyll_COM_23.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Wyll_COM_23.text: A warrior who winks at her foes while she slays them. You'd be a fool to refuse her.

OM_Wyll_COM_89.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_89.text: I have good news for you, then. I already killed the paladins you say were hunting you.

OM_Wyll_COM_79.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_79.text: I have good news for you, then. I already took care of the paladins you say were hunting you.

OM_Wyll_COM_155.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_155.text: You did?! That's incredible! You ought to let me return the favour. We can team up - evict this parasite, then take Faerûn by the short hairs. Sound good?

OM_Wyll_COM_0.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_Wyll_COM_0.text: A warrior who winks at her foes while she slays them. You'd be a fool to refuse her.

OM_Wyll_COM_152.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_152.text: All right - welcome to the team.

OM_Wyll_COM_167.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Wyll_COM_167.text: I like her. She looks like she could throw me over her shoulder and carry me to safety, should the need arise.

OM_Wyll_COM_41.speaker: Astarion
OM_Wyll_COM_41.text: She's almost as scary as you, Lae'zel. So naturally she gets my vote.
OM_Wyll_COM_41.context: NodeContext: "You want to just..." has a "wtf are you thinking?" tone. Then "Because I'm fine with that." is very calm and matter-of-fact

OM_Wyll_COM_184.speaker: Gale
OM_Wyll_COM_184.text: She's, erm, perhaps a little rough around the edges... but I suppose I can be smooth enough for two...
OM_Wyll_COM_184.context: NodeContext: A little skeptical (taking on a new, larger than life companion)

OM_Wyll_COM_51.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_51.text: I have my own problems. I don't need yours.

OM_Wyll_COM_94.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_94.text: I can see that. But look, if we take care of my little problem, we can move on to ours. The tadpole.

OM_Wyll_COM_61.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_61.text: Kill some fiends, evict a parasite, then take Faerûn by the short hairs. Sound good?

OM_Wyll_COM_270.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_270.text: You saw her thoughts. She poses no danger to the Sword Coast.

OM_Wyll_COM_180.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_180.text: You're right. Cut her down before she causes trouble.

OM_Wyll_COM_52.speaker: Wyll
OM_Wyll_COM_52.text: It's done, Karlach. By my living soul, you will forever burn.

OM_Wyll_COM_199.speaker: Karlach
OM_Wyll_COM_199.text: You know, I could've used a friend. Pity that won't be you.

OM_Wyll_COM_158.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_158.text: Looks like you found your mark, Wyll. Let's send your devil back to the Hells.

OM_Wyll_COM_24.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_24.text: The paladins of Tyr sent me for your head. And I mean to take it.

OM_Wyll_COM_229.speaker: Player
OM_Wyll_COM_229.text: These are no natural flames - prepare to fight.
